{{swichValue}} import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-if-switch-for', templateUrl: './if-switch-for.component.html', styleUrls: ['./if-switch-for.component.css'] }) export class IfSwitchForComponent { indicator = true; swichValue:string = " "; OnChange(){ this.indicator = false; } OnSwitch(event : any){ this.swichValue = event.target.value; } }
